Reference

Paths

Functions for configuring the paths at which data may be found

get_cache()

Load the Drake Cache for the Project

get_paths()

Get a list of the main paths to be used

Metadata

Functions for getting and setting dataset metadata

get_project_metadata()

Get Metadata for a Particular Project

metadata_template()

An example Metadata file for a dataset

Cache Access

Functions that make using the cache more convenient

load_merged_partitions()

Load and merge all partitions that match a prefix

Uncategorized Functions

default_config_path()

Default Path to Search for Local Configuration

get_portrpath()

Get the path Configuration object

resolve_config_path()

Resolve the configuration path
